name: Kill The Zombie Thief
description:
Time to beat, slice, punch and kill that stupid zombie thief who's trying to make off with your money. Its time to take out your anger and give as much punishment as you can, oh yeah :D

FEATURES
• Beat, slice, smash, and killing that moron zombie thief for 30 seconds feels so good. He'll wish he was never there.
• Choose your weapon you angry police man; a punch glove, a sword, a machine gun, or a rocket launcher, oh yeah!!
• Boss him around the vault like a ragdoll - great physics simulation.
• Fun n stupid cartoon theme which kids and adults will love. And a games that dont need wifi, woo hoo!
• Face yourself, conquer your high score, and post on our Facebook or Twitter page to show off. Help us go viral :)
